thread.title: Annmarie Leske
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Annmarie Leske

author: Annmarie Leske
title: Annmarie Leske
text: My sales agent Mr. Barr was knowledgeable and patient. I didn't feel pressured to buy. He informed me of all my buying and saving options that were available. I know i got the best bang for my buck! Sort of speak. My delivery men were polite and efficient. Thank you Gardner White. My livingroom looks and feels like home.
